goals.active: Rescue your krewemate Pol from the Inquest.
goals.complete: With the help of Zojja and Mr. Sparkles, I rescued Pol from the Inquest. Our traitorous krewe chief Varkk may have escaped, but I'm glad I chose to save my krewemate's life. Pol was all fired up after his ordeal, so he's joining us as we take down Teyo and recover the Transocator device.
